meanings.definition: A drug used to treat schizophrenia and other psychotic disorders.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed haloperidol to help with my schizophrenia.
meanings.sent2: She takes haloperidol every day to manage her psychotic disorder.
meanings.sent3: I told my friend that haloperidol is my new best friend for keeping my mind in check.
meanings.sent4: The effect of haloperidol on my thoughts was like a calming wave in a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The image of haloperidol pill reminds me to stay grounded and focused.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly known as Haldol.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended haloperidol as a more affordable alternative to Haldol.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother has been taking haloperidol, which is the same as Haldol.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly call haloperidol the 'Haldol twin' because they are so similar.
meanings.sent4: Switching from Haldol to haloperidol felt like changing the label on a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The word 'haloperidol' always reminds me of the brand name Haldol.
